name: SortField
description: Represents a condition in a sorting operation.

info.title: Office JavaScript Add-in API
info.description: Office JavaScript Add-in API for June fork

properties.name: key
properties.description: Represents the column (or row, depending on the sort orientation) that the condition is on. Represented as an offset from the first column (or row).

properties.name: sortOn
properties.description: Represents the type of sorting of this condition.

properties.name: ascending
properties.description: Represents whether the sorting is done in an ascending fashion.

properties.name: color
properties.description: Represents the color that is the target of the condition if the sorting is on font or cell color.

properties.name: dataOption
properties.description: Represents additional sorting options for this field.

properties.name: icon
properties.description: Represents the icon that is the target of the condition if the sorting is on the cell's icon.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Fills the proxy object created in JavaScript layer with property and object values specified in the parameter.

parameters.name: param
parameters.description: Accepts parameter and relationship names as delimited string or an array. Or, provide [loadOption](loadoption.md) object.
